g.text: Demonstrates functional error handling with Either type and error propagation patterns
message="Name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes"
Error: Invalid input: Name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes
sendError("Business rule violation: Name cannot be blank")
Error: Invalid input: Name cannot be blank
sendError("Failed to deliver greeting: Console output unavailable")
Error: Failed to deliver greeting: Console output unavailable
• Operations either succeed with a value or fail with an error
• Errors are typed and carry context
• No exceptions thrown for business logic failures
• Clear separation between expected and unexpected errors
